undecided
Class SpikePit

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      undecided.SpikePit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Obstacle
public class SpikePit
extends java.util.Observable
implements Obstacle

This class is the SpikePit object which essentially destroys the PlayerTank if it moves over it on the field. It has a location and map which it is on but it has no health so can't be destroyed.

Author:
Team Exception
See Also:
Item, TankView, PlayerTank, FireRing,Crate, ImmovableBlock, TNT, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

SpikePit

public SpikePit(Point p,
                Map map)
This is the class constructor for the SpikePit class. The SpikePit is an object that has no health so can't be destroyed but has a location and a map to be placed on.

Parameters:
p - point of the location at which the SpikePit is to be created.
map - map on which this SpikePit is to be created.
